content:
Topic: Hello from Japan (Asellus Lombardi)
Message: Hi everyone, I am Asellus Lombardi, a 17-year-old high school student from Japan. I am very interested in additive combinatorics and analytic number theory. I'm a complete beginner in Lean, but I joined this community to learn how to formalize my mathematical ideas.

Nice to meet you!

Nice to meet you!
2 messages were moved here from #new members > Partial Derivatives by Ruben Van de Velde.
